headline: Geneva10 Fulfillment Selects Zebra’s Automation Solution to Boost Productivity by Over 40%
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., July 30, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, today announced Geneva10 Fulfillment (G10) has chosen Zebra Symmetry™ Fulfillment, a comprehensive AI-powered solution combining the functions of a warehouse execution system (WES) with robot fleet management and powerful analytics, to increase productivity and reduce costs in its warehouse operations.
